column1: #Text=[0254] After mixing and standing for 24 hrs, the homogeneity of the product is checked.
#Text=In case of phase separation due to poor solubility of the perfume ingredient(s) an appropriate amount of Sodium p.
#Text=Cymene Sulfonate or another solubilising agent is added till a homogeneous solution is obtained.
#Text=[0256] Five grams of this solution are evenly applied on the upper side of a ceramic tile (875 square cm, e.g. from Vileroy-Boch).
#Text=After 1 minute the tile is rinsed with 1 liter of tap water.
#Text=The tile is then placed in a vertical position for 3 minutes to allow the rinse water to drip off.

#Text=[0257] Finally, the tile is placed in a clean and aerated perspex box (38.times.40.times.32 cm) with a removable cover that has a sliding-lid (10.times.10 cm) to allow expert evaluators to smell the interior phase of the box.
#Text=[0258] The odor in the box is evaluated just after placing the tile in it (fresh reading) and after 1, 2 and 6 hours.
